column4: Hey i have a question, i have just burned Ubuntu V10.10 on a DVD and it took like, 3-5 minutes with IMGBurn. Im just wondering if 726,827,008 bytes sound right o_O
Alright another question -- im new to "Ubuntu" as a matter of fact this is my First Time installing it. I was just wondering if any of you had a good "Tutorial"?
there are post-install guides you can search for, or ppl can give you tweak tips
